mapper.select: select * from writing where categoryIdx != 'help' order by idx desc limit #{startNo}, #{pageSize}
select w.idx, w.categoryIdx, w.userId, w.subject, w.content,w.readCount, w.commentCount, w.wdate, c.name from writing w left join category c on w.categoryIdx = c.idx where w.idx = #{idx}

select w.idx, userId, subject, content, w.categoryIdx, c.name, w.wdate from writing w join category c on w.categoryIdx = c.idx where w.categoryIdx = #{idx} order by idx desc limit #{startNo}, #{pageSize}
select w.idx, userId, subject, content, c.name from writing w join category c on w.categoryIdx = c.idx where w.subject like CONCAT('%', #{subject}, '%')
select w.idx, userId, subject, content, c.name from writing w join category c on w.categoryIdx = c.idx where w.userId like CONCAT('%', #{userId}, '%')
select count(*) from writing where categoryIdx = #{idx}
select w.idx, userId, subject, content, c.name from writing w join category c on w.categoryIdx = c.idx where w.content like CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%')
select * from writing where categoryIdx = 'HELP' and userId = #{userId}
select * from jjim j right join writing w on j.idx = w.idx where j.userId = #{userId}
select * from writing order by readCount desc limit #{count}
mapper.update: update writing set readCount = readCount + 1 where idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: insert into writing(categoryIdx, userId, subject, content) values (#{categoryIdx}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content})
